title: Murder of a Barbie and Ken
description: It all began innocently enough, when Skye in search of a social life in Scumble River, recently joined the GUMBettes-the ladies auxiliary of the men's Grand Union of the Mighty Bulls, Scumble River's premier social club. But then Skye ended up wrapped in wallpaper, and the club leaders, Barbie and Ken Addison, ended up dead.Barbie and Ken appeared to be living a dream life, but then who would want to kill such living dolls?
author: Denise Swanson
